name: Chicken Curry (Kukul Mas Curry)
description: A rich, aromatic chicken curry with roasted Sri Lankan spices and coconut milk
instructions: Marinate chicken with turmeric, chili powder, and salt for 30 minutes
Heat oil in a large pan and add cinnamon, cardamom, and cloves
Add curry leaves and sauté until fragrant (Curry leaves must be fresh for authentic taste)
Add sliced onions and cook until golden brown
Add garlic, ginger, and green chilies; sauté for 2 minutes
Add roasted curry powder and cook for 1 minute
Add marinated chicken and mix well
Pour in thin coconut milk and bring to a simmer gently (Never boil coconut milk vigorously - it will curdle)
Reduce heat and simmer for 30 minutes until chicken is tender
Add thick coconut milk and simmer for 10 more minutes
Adjust seasoning and serve hot with rice
cultural_notes: This is the most popular Sri Lankan chicken curry, typically served at special occasions and family gatherings Roast curry powder in a dry pan first for authentic flavor. Use fresh curry leaves, not dried. Coconut milk should be added in two stages - thin first, thick at the end.

sinhala: ඉඟුරු ගෙඩිය කැබලි කර යුෂ ගමුකර ඇටකිරි වලින් රස වැඩි වේ
english: Use freshly roasted curry powder for best flavor

description_sinhala: බැදපු ශ්‍රී ලාංකීය කුළුබඩු සහ පොල් කිරි සමග පොහොසත්, ඇරෝමැටික චිකන් කරියක්
description_tamil: வறுத்த இலங்கை மசாலா மற்றும் தேங்காய்ப்பால் கொண்ட செழுமையான, நறுமணமுள்ள கோழிக் கறி
cultural_notes_sinhala: මෙය වඩාත් ජනප්‍රිය ශ්‍රී ලාංකික කුකුල් මස් ව්‍යංජනය වන අතර, සාමාන්‍යයෙන් විශේෂ අවස්ථා සහ පවුලේ රැස්වීම් වලදී පිළිගන්වනු ලැබේ
cultural_notes_tamil: இது மிகவும் பிரபலமான இலங்கை கோழிக் கறியாகும், இது பொதுவாக விசேஷ சந்தர்ப்பங்களில் மற்றும் குடும்பக் கூட்டங்களில் பரிமாறப்படுகிறது
